display_long_description:
Team up with your new best friend **Slappy** and transform your space into a chaotic sports arena. It's Mega Fireball!

**🔥 Bring The Heat** 

Control Slappy to smash balls into the goal or punch them in yourself!
[media]


**💪 Challenge Mode** 

Show off your skills on the global leaderboard by competing in challenges featuring core gameplay + three unique themes: **Lava, Space, and Colors**
[media]


**🤯 Remote Mixed-Reality Multiplayer** 

Battle 1v1 against friends from across the world using their real room
[media]

**🤜🤛 8 Player Local Multiplayer** 

Buddy up with 8 players in the same space
[media]
